Dialogue.dialogueline: What do you mean there are 'missing funds'?
Dialogue.name: Scientist

Dialogue.dialogueline: Exactly what it sounds like, I’ve checked some records and theres always a small disparity with the value, they’re just gone.
Dialogue.name: Accountant

Dialogue.dialogueline: Seems like so, or at least nobody cared to because its not that big considering the full picture, but what annoys me is that there is no record, they are just gone, vanishing.
Dialogue.name: Accountant

Dialogue.dialogueline: Only someone with complete access to the companies Financial records could make that, I am no mathematician myself, but I don’t think numbers just disappear like that.
Dialogue.name: Scientist

Dialogue.dialogueline: Indeed, well I have to go now, bye.
Dialogue.name: Accountant

Dialogue.dialogueline: Seems like I'll have to pay a visit to the head accountant office too.
Dialogue.name: Player

Dialogue.dialogueline: This man sure has a lot of prizes, now to see if they're actually his.
Dialogue.name: Player
